mapper.select: select outt.id,orderId,staff.name as staffName,product.name as productName,customer.name as customerName,productNum,createdDate,lastModifyDate,outt.info,price,pay from outt,product,customer,staff where orderId like "%"#{key}"%" and product.Id = outt.productId and outt.customerId=customer.id and staff.id=outt.staffId order by outt.id desc limit #{start},#{num}
select count(id) from outt where orderId like "%"#{key}"%"

select outt.id,orderId,staff.name as staffName,product.id as productId,customer.id as customerId,product.name as productName,customer.name as productName,productNum,createdDate,lastModifyDate,outt.info,price,pay from outt,product,customer,staff where product.Id = outt.productId and outt.customerId=customer.id and outt.id=#{id} and staff.id=outt.staffId
select count(id) from outt where customerId=#{customerId}
